body_html:
Unfortunately tensors aren't an option because they would incur quadratic time and space overhead.

Interesting. May I ask why this is quadratic in this context?

Sounds like the beam search code needs to be extended to support TensorArray in the state.

Sounds good. Are you planning to work on this in the near future?

body:
> Unfortunately tensors aren't an option because they would incur quadratic time and space overhead.

Interesting. May I ask why this is quadratic in this context?

> Sounds like the beam search code needs to be extended to support TensorArray in the state.

Sounds good. Are you planning to work on this in the near future?
